content:
Yes, there are a few other foreign films on MUBI that have been gaining critical acclaim or awards. Here are a few more recommendations you can consider:

1. "Bacurau" (Brazil, 2019): This surreal thriller won the Jury Prize at Cannes Film Festival and tells the story of a small town in rural Brazil that disappears from the map. 2. "Two of Us" (France, 2019): This drama won the Audience Award at the Cannes Film Festival and follows two retired women who have been secretly in love for decades. 3. "The Disciple" (India, 2020): This drama won the FIPRESCI Critics Prize at the Venice Film Festival and tells the story of a young classical singer in Mumbai who struggles to maintain his passion in the face of societal pressure and personal setbacks. 4. "Another Round" (Denmark, 2020): This comedy-drama won the Best International Feature Film award at the 93rd Academy Awards and follows a group of middle-aged friends who decide to experiment with drinking alcohol on a daily basis. I hope you find these recommendations helpful as well!
